name: Masters of Evil
description:
You’re an EVIL organization, but look out, there are other evil organizations afoot! Choose an organization type and engage with fantastical monsters and events! Use incredibly powerful items, to spread your brand of evil over the realm! Gain the most influence in the realm and appease your Elder God to claim world domination! Muahahahaha!!!

A card game RPG for 2-3 players.

Art by Alex Fleming
Descriptive text by Jarrid Reagle
System Design by Lawson Leong
